name: Super Arcade Rewind
description:
My Entry to the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

The theme was: REWIND

-----------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move

Enter to shoot

Space to rewind

Tips:

Try to hit the enemies with your rewind, something cool might happen...

While in start screen you can see your highscore in the upper left corner

-----------------------------------------------

It is recommended to NOT play in fullscreen

If you have feedback and/or encounter any bugs feel free to tell me, thank you for playing!

Also brag about your highscore in the comments! :D

Art and Code are mine, music is by DOS88 (https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library)
